extensionName.message: GPT Reader: Free AI Text to Speech with ChatGPT Voices, TTS

extensionDescription.message: Natural ChatGPT AI text to speech (TTS) for PDFs, articles, & docs. Download or read aloud using high-quality voices with GPT Reader

drag_and_drop_files.message: Drag 'n' Drop Files Here, or Click to Select File

upload_limit.message: You Can Upload a File Up to 24 MB

would_you_like_to_download_or_listen.message: Would you like to download or listen to the audio?

download_note.message: Subject to be behind a paywall in the future

please_wait_file_downloading.message: Please wait while the file is being downloaded...

full_download_note.message: If the file did not download automatically, please click the 'Download' button below.

gpt4_download_note.message: Dear ChatGPT premium users, make sure the model you choose is GPT-4o mini for faster speeds. Close the overlay to change models.

cancel_download_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?

accuracy_warning.message: GPT Reader may generate audio that isn't 100% accurate. If you notice differences, close the overlay, start a new ChatGPT chat, and try again.

feedback_prompt.message: We're always looking to improve. Please let us know how we can do better.

feedback_question.message: What do you think about this extension?

error_no_start.message: An error prevented the download from starting, please close the overlay and try again

error_stopped_midway.message: The download stopped due to an error. Download the processed audio so far below.

cancel_download_confirmation_title.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?

cancel_download_confirmation_sr.message: Do you want to cancel the download?

note_partial_audio.message: Note: Click the download button above to get the audio processed so far.

gpt_reader_chunk_explanation.message: GPT Reader works by breaking down large text into smaller chunks and sending them to ChatGPT for analysis. This is a normal and expected process. However, depending on your usage, you might temporarily reach ChatGPT's rate limits. If this happens, you may need to wait about an hour before using ChatGPT or this extension again.

acknowledge_and_accept.message: By continuing, you acknowledge and accept this as part of using the extension.

offline_warning.message: You seem to be offline! Please check your network and try again!

slow_response_warning.message: GPT Reader is taking longer than usual. Close the overlay to check for errors. GPT-4 recommended.

voice_selector_description.message: Choose from a variety of ChatGPT-enhanced voices. Select before uploading your text.

cannot_upload_one_file.message: Cannot upload more than 1 file at a time

chatgpt_issue.message: ChatGPT seems to be having issues; please check their website.

simplify_reading.message: Simplify reading long documents with GPT

ongoing_conversation_error.message: There is an ongoing conversation or you've exceeded the hourly limit. Please wait!

chat_error.message: ChatGPT might be showing an error or you hit a limit. Check their site for details.

input_required_error.message: This is a required field (min 5 characters)

please_wait_previous.message: Please wait until the previous request finishes

presence_confirmation_yes.message: Yes, I want to continue listening
